alert.note: Alert for Ashland; Bayfield; Sawyer (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 28 at 2:00PM CDT until June 28 at 2:30PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 230 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN BAYFIELD...SOUTHERN ASHLAND AND NORTHEASTERN SAWYER COUNTIES... At 159 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles northeast of Clam Lake, to near Namekagon, to near Namekagon Lake, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. Golf ball size hail was reported earlier with this storm near Namekagon. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Clam Lake around 205 PM CDT. Glidden around 220 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Morse, Ghost Lake, Blaisdell Lake, Teal Lake, Day Lake, Moose Lake Sawyer County and Lake Owen. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
